reionization¶

Reionization model.

Table of Methods

photoion_rate(species) Photoionization rate.
photoheat_rate(species) Photoheating rate.
alphaA_recomb(species, T) Case-A recombination coefficient.
coll_ion_rate(species, T_m) Collisional ionization rate.
recomb_cooling_rate(xHII, xHeII, xHeIII, T_m, rs) Recombination cooling rate.
coll_ion_cooling_rate(xHII, xHeII, xHeIII, …) Collisional ionization cooling rate.
coll_exc_cooling_rate(xHII, xHeII, xHeIII, …) Collisional excitation cooling rate.
brem_cooling_rate(xHII, xHeII, xHeIII, T_m, rs) Bremsstrahlung cooling rate.

Methods¶

darkhistory.history.reionization.photoion_rate(species)¶

Photoionization rate.

Parameters:species ({'HI', 'HeI', 'HeII'}) –
Returns:Interpolating function which takes redshift as an argument, and returns the photoionization rate of the species in s^-1. See 1801.04931.
Return type:function
darkhistory.history.reionization.alphaA_recomb(species, T)¶

Case-A recombination coefficient.

Parameters:
  • species ({'HII', 'HeIIr', 'HeIId', 'HeIII'}) – Species of interest.
  • T (float) – Matter temperature in eV.
Returns:

Case-A recombination coefficient in cm^3/s. See astro-ph/0607331.
Return type:

float
darkhistory.history.reionization.coll_ion_rate(species, T_m)¶

Collisional ionization rate.

Parameters:
  • species ({'HI', 'HeI', 'HeII'}) – Species of interest.
  • T_m (float) – Matter temperature in eV.
Returns:

Collisional ionization rate in s^-1. See astro-ph/0607331.
Return type:

float
darkhistory.history.reionization.recomb_cooling_rate(xHII, xHeII, xHeIII, T_m, rs)¶

Recombination cooling rate.

Parameters:
  • xHII (float) – n_HII/n_H.
  • xHeII (float) – n_HeII/n_H.
  • xHeIII (float) – n_HeIII/n_H.
  • T_m (float) – Matter temperature in eV.
  • rs (float) – Redshift (1+z).
Returns:

Recombination cooling rate in eV s^-1. See astro-ph/0607331.
Return type:

float
darkhistory.history.reionization.coll_ion_cooling_rate(xHII, xHeII, xHeIII, T_m, rs)¶

Collisional ionization cooling rate.

Parameters:
  • xHII (float) – n_HII/n_H.
  • xHeII (float) – n_HeII/n_H.
  • xHeIII (float) – n_HeIII/n_H.
  • T_m (float) – Matter temperature in eV.
  • rs (float) – Redshift (1+z).
Returns:

Collisional ionization cooling rate in eV s^-1. See astro-ph/0607331.
Return type:

float
darkhistory.history.reionization.brem_cooling_rate(xHII, xHeII, xHeIII, T_m, rs)¶

Bremsstrahlung cooling rate.

Parameters:
  • xHII (float) – n_HII/n_H.
  • xHeII (float) – n_HeII/n_H.
  • xHeIII (float) – n_HeIII/n_H.
  • T_m (float) – Matter temperature in eV.
  • rs (float) – Redshift (1+z).
Returns:

Bremsstrahlung cooling rate in eV s^-1. See astro-ph/0607331.
Return type:

float
